definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: The big sex news of the week was that bisexual men exist.
sentences.chinese: 本周的一大性新闻就是，这个世界上存在男双性恋者。

sentences.english: Many bisexuals don't tell all of their relatives, or their co-workers.
sentences.chinese: 很多双性恋都不会和他们所有的亲戚或者同事说。

sentences.english: I lived as a gay, wanted to be straight, decided to be bixesual, and finally got married, but was never faithful.
sentences.chinese: 我像同性恋那样生活也想变直，就决定做个双性恋。

sentences.english: I found out my 17-year-old daughter might be bisexual or gay.
sentences.chinese: 我发现我17岁大的女儿可能是双性恋或同性恋。

sentences.english: They share same-sex fantasies or want to try out bi-sexuality.
sentences.chinese: 他们能分享同样的性爱幻想或者想尝试双性恋。

sentences.english: The same goes for bisexuals in monogamous relationships.
sentences.chinese: 这在双性恋的一夫一妻制关系中也是一样的。

sentences.english: That's all it takes, seriously. Are you bisexual?
sentences.chinese: 以上就是全部，严肃的说。你是双性恋吗？

sentences.english: So, should we picture bisexuality as an island too?
sentences.chinese: 那么，我们应不应该将双性恋想象为一个岛屿？

sentences.english: Well Reader, yes bisexuality among women is very common in the Lifestyle.
sentences.chinese: 是的，在生活方式上，女性的双性恋很普遍的。

sentences.english: Incidentally, you don't have to come out to everyone.
sentences.chinese: 顺便一提，你不需要跟所有人说你是双性恋。

sentences.english: Convincing bisexuals to limit their sexual activities to members of the opposite sex.
sentences.chinese: 说服双性恋控制他们对异性的性行为。

sentences.english: How prevalent is female bisexuality in the lifestyle? and
sentences.chinese: 在生活方式上，女性是双性恋者有多普遍？

sentences.english: All of the participants self-identified as heterosexual or bisexual.
sentences.chinese: 所有的参与者都声称是异性恋或者双性恋。

sentences.english: Want to know what books 30-year-old bisexual Latina women from Michigan are reading?
sentences.chinese: 想知道密歇根州30岁的双性恋拉丁妇女在看什么书？

sentences.english: Freud's idea was that everybody is bisexual.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德的想法是，每个人都是双性恋。

sentences.english: Bisexuality is a cop-out or a phase.
sentences.chinese: 双性恋是一个站不住脚的借口，或者是人的某个阶段。

definition: fujoshi (woman who likes mangas about male homosexual love)
to come out of the closet/to reveal one's sexual orientation
